PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run nzbhydra as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run NZBHydra as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run NZBHydra as.

NZBHydra2.description:
NZBHydra2 is a meta search app for NZB indexers, the spiritual successor to NZBmegasearcH.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
